item.name: OM: Chassis Express Service Code Name
item.description: This attribute defines the express service code of the system.

item.name: OM: Chassis Intrusion Status
item.description: Defines the intrusion status of all intrusion detection devices in this chassis. The result is returned as a combined status value. The value has the same definition type as DellStatus.

item.name: OM: Chassis Model Name
item.description: Defines the system model type for this chassis.

item.name: OM: Chassis Service Tag NameName
item.description: Defines the service tag name for this chassis.

item.name: OM: Chassis Status
item.description: Defines the system status of this chassis.

item.name: OM: Event Log Status
item.description: Defines the overall status of this chassis (ESM) event log.

item.name: OM: Fan Status
item.description: This attribute defines the cooling device status of all cooling devices in this chassis. The results is returned as a combined status value. The value has the same definition type as DellStatus.

item.name: OM: Fan Unit Status
item.description: Defines the combined status of all cooling units of this chassis.

item.name: OM: Global System Status
item.description: Defines the global system status of all chassis being monitored by this instrumentation instance.

item.name: OM: Memory Status
item.description: Defines the status of all memory devices in this chassis.

item.name: OM: Power Supply Status
item.description: Defines the status of all power supplies in this chassis.

item.name: OM: Processor Status
item.description: Defines the combined status of all processor devices of this chassis.

item.name: OM: Temperature Status
item.description: Defines the status of all temperature probes in this chassis. The result is returned as a combined status value. The value has the same definition type as DellStatus.

discovery_rule.name: OM: Discovery arrayDisk
discovery_rule.description: Identifies the current state of the array disk.

item_prototype.name: OM: Array Disk Smart Alert Indication ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Indicates whether the disk has received a predictive failure.

item_prototype.name: OM: Array Disk State ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Identifies the current state of the array disk.

trigger_prototype.name: DELL OMSA: Predictive failure detected on {#SNMPVALUE}

discovery_rule.name: OM: Discovery controllerRollUpStatus
discovery_rule.description: Indicates severity of the controller state. This is the combined status of the controller and its components.

item_prototype.name: OM: Controller Roll-Up Status {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: Indicates severity of the controller state. This is the combined status of the controller and its components.

trigger_prototype.name: DELL OMSA: RAID controller is Error on instance {#SNMPINDEX}

discovery_rule.name: OM: Discovery memoryDeviceStatus
discovery_rule.description: Identifies the status of the memory device.

item_prototype.name: OM: Memory Device Status ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Defines the status of the memory device.

trigger_prototype.name: DELL OMSA: Memory Device({#SNMPVALUE}) is Error

discovery_rule.name: OM: Discovery processorDeviceStatus
discovery_rule.description: Indicates the status of the processor device.

item_prototype.name: OM: processorDeviceStatus ({#SNMPINDEX})
item_prototype.description: Defines the status of the processor device.

trigger_prototype.name: DELL OMSA: Processor Device is Error on instance {#SNMPINDEX}

discovery_rule.name: OM: Discovery Storage batteryRollUpStatus
discovery_rule.description: Severity of the battery state. This is the combined status of the battery and its components.

item_prototype.name: OM: Storage Battery Roll-Up Status ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Severity of the battery state. This is the combined status of the battery and its components.

trigger_prototype.name: DELL OMSA: RAID Battery({#SNMPVALUE}) is Error

discovery_rule.name: OM: Discovery virtualDisk
discovery_rule.description: Identifies the current state of this virtual disk.

item_prototype.name: OM: Virtual Disk Layout ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Indicates the virtual disk's RAID type. Possible values.

item_prototype.name: OM: Virtual Disk Read Policy ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Indicates whether the controller's read cache are used when reading from a virtual disk.

item_prototype.name: OM: Virtual Disk State ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Identifies the current state of this virtual disk.

item_prototype.name: OM: Virtual Disk Write Policy ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Indicates whether the controller's write cache are used when writing to a virtual disk.

trigger.name: DELL OMSA: Chassis Status is Error
DELL OMSA: Event Log Status is Error
DELL OMSA: Fan Status is Error
DELL OMSA: Fan Unit Status is Error
DELL OMSA: Global System Status is Error
DELL OMSA: Memory Status is Error
DELL OMSA: Power Supply Status is Error
DELL OMSA: Processor Status is Error
DELL OMSA: Temperature Status is Error
DELL OMSA: Voltage Status is Error
